biolockj.module.r

Class R_Module

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.r.R_Module
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, ScriptModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildMdsPlots, BuildOtuPlots, BuildPvalHistograms, CalculateStats

    public abstract class R_Module
extends ScriptModuleImpl
implements ScriptModule
    This BioModule is the superclass for R script generating modules.

      R function used to import required libraries: "importLibs"

      Name of the function used to execute an R script: "runScript"

      The standard indentation size in the R script is 4 spaces.

      File extension of R Script log file: ".log"

      Name of the main method for any BioLockJ R Script.
      protected static String METHOD_REPORT_STATUS
      R method name for reportStatus: "reportStatus"

      R method name: "runProgram"
      static String NOMINAL_ATTS
      Global R script vector containing all report metadata nominal fields: "nominalAtts"

      Global R script vector containing all report nominal metadata fields: "nominalCols"
      static String NUM_META_COLS
      Defines the number of metadata columns in our merged OTU-metadata tables.
      static String NUMERIC_ATTS
      Global R script vector containing all report metadata numeric fields: "numericAtts"
      protected static String NUMERIC_COLS
      Global R script vector containing all report numeric metadata fields: "numericCols"
      protected static String OTU_COL
      Name of OTU column index variable incremented in R wrapper code-blocks filterRareOtus(String) and forEachOtu(String) : "otuCol"
      static String OTU_LEVEL
      Variable name holding one of the "otuLevels" (taxonomy levels): "otuLevel"
      static String OTU_LEVELS
      Name of taxonomy levels variable in R script methods: "otuLevels"
      static String OTU_TABLE
      Name of variable that stores read.table() output
      static String R_BASE_DIR
      Global R script variable containing path to R Script root file directory: "baseDir"
      protected static String R_DATA_EXT
      File extension of R Script data file: ".RData"
      protected static String R_DEBUG
      Config Boolean property: "r.debug"
      If enabled, an R script debug log file is created for each taxonomy level.
      static String R_EXT
      File extension of BioLockJ generated R Scripts: ".R"
      protected static String R_FILTER_FIELDS
      Config List property: "r.filterFields"
      Ordered list of filter fields to include in R-wrapper code-block, to filter rows using their corresponding "r.filterOperators" and "r.filterValues".
      protected static String R_FILTER_NA_FIELDS
      Config List property: "r.filterNaFields"
      Ordered list of fields to omit rows with NA value in filter-block R-code wrapper.
      protected static String R_FILTER_OPERATORS
      Config List property: "r.filterOperators"
      Ordered list of logical operators to use in R-wrapper code-block along with their corresponding "r.filterFields" and "r.filterValues".
      protected static String R_FILTER_VALUES
      Config List property: "r.filterValues"
      Ordered list of filter values use in R-wrapper code-block along with their corresponding "r.filterOperators" and "r.filterFields".
      static String R_LOCAL_DIR_NAME
      Directory name where output generated by downloaded R scripts is output: "local"
      static String R_OUTPUT_DIR
      Global R script variable containing path to R Script output file directory: "outputDir"
      protected static String R_RARE_OTU_THRESHOLD
      Config Numeric property: "r.rareOtuThreshold"
      If value is between 0-1, it is considered a minimum percentage.
      protected static String R_SAVE_R_DATA
      Config Boolean property: "r.saveRData" can be enable to call save.image to save the R session used to run the R script.
      static String R_SCRIPT_DIR
      Global R script variable containing path to R Script directory: "scriptDir"
      static String R_STATS_DIR
      Global R script variable containing path to R Script directory containing pvalue reports: "statsDir"
      static String R_TABLE_DIR
      Global R script variable containing path to R Script input file directory: "tableDir"
      static String R_TEMP_DIR
      Global R script variable containing path to R Script temporary directory: "tempDir"
      protected static String R_TIMEOUT
      Config property "r.timeout" defines the number of minutes before R script fails due to timeout.
      static String TSV_EXT
      File extension of TSV (tab-separated text) files read or generated by R Script: ".tsv"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<List<String>> buildDockerBashScript()
      Run R script in docker.
      List<List<String>> buildScript(List<File> files)
      Not needed for R script modules.
      void checkDependencies()
      Validate configuration file properties used to build the R report: Get positive integer Config."r.timeout" Verify query fields are valid via getOtuTableFilter()
      protected String enableDebug(String rCode, String otuLevel)
      The method returns the rCode wrapped in a sink() block if "r.debug" is enabled.
      The log file is saved the the rModule temp directory with prefix "debug_" and the suffix ".log".
      void executeTask()
      Builds an R script by calling sub-methods to builds the BaseScript and creates the MAIN script shell that sources the BaseScript, calls runProgram(), reportStatus() and main() which can only be implemented in a subclass.
      Call RMetaUtil.classifyReportableMetadata() Call initializePrimaryScript() Call rMethodImportLibs(List)( getRequiredLibs() ) Call updatePrimaryScript(String)( rMainMethod() ) Call updatePrimaryScript(String)( rMethodReportStatus() ) Call updatePrimaryScript(String)( rMethodRunProgram() ) Call BaseScript.buildScript(R_Module)
      protected String filterRareOtus(String code)
      This method wraps the R code input in an if statement to filter out rare OTUs.
      protected String forEachOtu(String code)
      This method wraps in the R code input in a for-loop that iterates through all OTU column indexes by incrementing "otuCol" from 2:lastOtuCol.
      protected String forEachOtuLevel(String rCode)
      The method returns R code to run rCode for each taxonomy level configured.
      static String getDebugLabel(String printVal)
      If Config."r.debug"="Y", wrap printVal with a print statement to log the text to the R debug file.
      static String getDebugLine(String line)
      If Config."r.debug"="Y", wrap printVal with a print statement to log the text to the R debug file and print the R code output.
      String[] getJobParams()
      If running Docker, run the Docker bash script, otherwise:
      Run Config."exe.Rscript" command on the generated R Script: ModuleUtil.getMainScript(BioModule).
      static String getLine(String line)
      Return the value with the return escape character: BioLockJ.RETURN
      static String getLine(String line, boolean debug)
      Return the value with the return escape character: BioLockJ.RETURN
      protected List<String> getOtuTableFilter()
      Build the otuTable filter after verifying the required Config properties.
      List<Class<?>> getPreRequisiteModules()
      All R modules require combined OTU-metadata tables.
      File getPrimaryScript()
      Get the primary R script
      abstract List<String> getRequiredLibs()
      Get the list of require libs that is passed to rMethodImportLibs(java.util.List<java.lang.String>) to import required R libraries
      String getSummary()
      Produce summary file counts for each file extension in the output directory and the number of log files in the temp directory.
      Integer getTimeout()
      The R Script should run quickly, timeout = 10 minutes appears to work well.
      List<String> getWorkerScriptFunctions()
      This method generates the bash function: "runScript"
      protected void initializePrimaryScript()
      Initialize the R script by creating the MAIN R script that calls source on the BaseScript and adds the R code for the runProgarm() method.
      protected String rLinesCreateAttColVectors()
      This method initializes the R Report by parsing the OTU abundance table for column indexes.
      protected String rLineSetPreFilter()
      Add table filter if configured in prop file.
      protected String rLinesExecuteProgram()
      Wrap call to main() with sink() method to capture errors/warnings in the error file.
      protected String rLinesReadOtuTable()
      This method is used to read in the reports output by AddMetadataToOtuTables
      static String rLinesReadStatsTable(String tableName, String suffix)
      This method is used to read in the reports output by CalculateStats
      protected abstract String rMainMethod()
      Each R script must build a function called main() which is called from the standard runProgram() method which wraps the method in error-handling code.
      protected String rMethodImportLibs(List<String> libs)
      If libs is not null and not empty, return the function to import the libraries given.
      protected String rMethodReportStatus()
      This method returns R code for the function "reportStatus".
      At the end of the R script we check the sink() file for error messages, if none, we declare SUCCESS.
      protected static String rMethodRunProgram()
      This method returns R code for the function runProgram().
      protected void updatePrimaryScript(String rCode)
      This method adds R code to the Primary R script in the rModule script directory.
      static void writeNewScript(String path, String rCode)
      This method generates an R script with the given rCode saved to the given path.

      • R_RARE_OTU_THRESHOLD

        protected static final String R_RARE_OTU_THRESHOLD
        Config Numeric property: "r.rareOtuThreshold"
        If value is between 0-1, it is considered a minimum percentage. If value is greater than 1, it is a hard numerical minimum. OTUs not found in the number or percentage of samples configured will be ommitted from the report.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • R_TIMEOUT

        protected static final String R_TIMEOUT
        Config property "r.timeout" defines the number of minutes before R script fails due to timeout. If undefined, no timeout is used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • checkDependencies

        public void checkDependencies()
                       throws Exception
        Validate configuration file properties used to build the R report:
        1. Get positive integer Config."r.timeout"
        2. Verify query fields are valid via getOtuTableFilter()
        Specified by:
        checkDependencies in interface BioModule
        Overrides:
        checkDependencies in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if missing or invalid dependencies are found

      • executeTask

        public void executeTask()
                 throws Exception
        Builds an R script by calling sub-methods to builds the BaseScript and creates the MAIN script shell that sources the BaseScript, calls runProgram(), reportStatus() and main() which can only be implemented in a subclass.
        1. Call RMetaUtil.classifyReportableMetadata()
        2. Call initializePrimaryScript()
        3. Call rMethodImportLibs(List)( getRequiredLibs() )
        4. Call updatePrimaryScript(String)( rMainMethod() )
        5. Call updatePrimaryScript(String)( rMethodReportStatus() )
        6. Call updatePrimaryScript(String)( rMethodRunProgram() )
        7. Call BaseScript.buildScript(R_Module)
        Specified by:
        executeTask in interface BioModule
        Overrides:
        executeTask in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if the module is unable to complete is task

      • getJobParams

        public String[] getJobParams()
                      throws Exception
        If running Docker, run the Docker bash script, otherwise:
        Run Config."exe.Rscript" command on the generated R Script: ModuleUtil.getMainScript(BioModule).
        Specified by:
        getJobParams in interface ScriptModule
        Overrides:
        getJobParams in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Returns:
        Runtime.exec(String) parameters
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to build the job parameters

        public String getSummary()

        public Integer getTimeout()

        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Returns:

      • enableDebug

        protected String enableDebug(String rCode,
                             String otuLevel)
                      throws ConfigFormatException
        The method returns the rCode wrapped in a sink() block if "r.debug" is enabled.
        The log file is saved the the rModule temp directory with prefix "debug_" and the suffix ".log".
        Parameters:
        rCode - R code
        otuLevel - OTU level
        Returns:
        R code wrapped in a sink() block
        Throws:
        ConfigFormatException - if Config properties are invalid or missing

      • filterRareOtus

        protected String filterRareOtus(String code)
                         throws Exception
        This method wraps the R code input in an if statement to filter out rare OTUs. Rare OTUs are filtered out of the R reports as defined in property Config."r.rareOtuThreshold". If "r.rareOtuThreshold" is between 0-1, it is considered a minimum percentage. If "r.rareOtuThreshold" is greater than 1, it is a specific numeric value. OTUs not found in the number or percentage of samples configured will be omitted from the report.
        Parameters:
        code - R code to wrap in filter if-statement code block
        Returns:
        R code wrapped in the if-statement used to filter rare OTUs
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config."r.rareOtuThreshold" is missing or invalid

      • forEachOtu

        protected String forEachOtu(String code)
        This method wraps in the R code input in a for-loop that iterates through all OTU column indexes by incrementing "otuCol" from 2:lastOtuCol. The R code will then be executed for each OTU.
        Parameters:
        code - R code to wrap in for loop
        Returns:
        R code

      • forEachOtuLevel

        protected String forEachOtuLevel(String rCode)
        The method returns R code to run rCode for each taxonomy level configured.
        Parameters:
        rCode - R code
        Returns:
        R code wrapped in a for loop

      • getOtuTableFilter

        protected List<String> getOtuTableFilter()
                                  throws Exception
        Build the otuTable filter after verifying the required Config properties.
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config properties are invalid or missing

      • initializePrimaryScript

        protected void initializePrimaryScript()
                                throws Exception
        Initialize the R script by creating the MAIN R script that calls source on the BaseScript and adds the R code for the runProgarm() method.
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to build the R script stub

      • rLinesCreateAttColVectors

        protected String rLinesCreateAttColVectors()
                                    throws Exception
        This method initializes the R Report by parsing the OTU abundance table for column indexes.
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config properties are invalid or missing

      • rLineSetPreFilter

        protected String rLineSetPreFilter()
                            throws Exception
        Add table filter if configured in prop file. Examples:
        otuTable = otuTable[ otuTable$Location != "OffTargetOrganoid" ]
        otuTable = otuTable[ otuTable$Location == "OffTargetOrganoid" | otuTable$Location == "OffTarget", ]
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config properties are invalid or missing

      • rLinesExecuteProgram

        protected String rLinesExecuteProgram()
                               throws Exception
        Wrap call to main() with sink() method to capture errors/warnings in the error file. Output success/failure flag files and write errors to error report.
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config properties are invalid or missing

      • rLinesReadOtuTable

        protected String rLinesReadOtuTable()
                             throws Exception
        This method is used to read in the reports output by AddMetadataToOtuTables
        Returns:
        rCode
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs

      • rMainMethod

        protected abstract String rMainMethod()
                               throws Exception
        Each R script must build a function called main() which is called from the standard runProgram() method which wraps the method in error-handling code.
        Returns:
        R code for the function main()
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to build this required method

      • rMethodImportLibs

        protected String rMethodImportLibs(List<String> libs)
        If libs is not null and not empty, return the function to import the libraries given.
        Parameters:
        libs - List of R libraries
        Returns:
        rCode

      • rMethodReportStatus

        protected String rMethodReportStatus()
                              throws Exception
        This method returns R code for the function "reportStatus".
        At the end of the R script we check the sink() file for error messages, if none, we declare SUCCESS.
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • updatePrimaryScript

        protected void updatePrimaryScript(String rCode)
                            throws Exception
        This method adds R code to the Primary R script in the rModule script directory.
        Parameters:
        rCode - R script code
        Throws:
        Exception - if I/O errors occur

      • getDebugLabel

        public static String getDebugLabel(String printVal)
                            throws Exception
        If Config."r.debug"="Y", wrap printVal with a print statement to log the text to the R debug file.
        Parameters:
        printVal - Value to log
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config."r.debug" value is invalid

      • getDebugLine

        public static String getDebugLine(String line)
                           throws Exception
        If Config."r.debug"="Y", wrap printVal with a print statement to log the text to the R debug file and print the R code output.
        Parameters:
        line - R script line to debug
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config."r.debug" value is invalid

      • getLine

        public static String getLine(String line)
        Return the value with the return escape character: BioLockJ.RETURN
        Parameters:
        line - Line of R code
        Returns:
        R code with a newline escape char

      • getLine

        public static String getLine(String line,
                             boolean debug)
                      throws Exception
        Return the value with the return escape character: BioLockJ.RETURN
        Parameters:
        line - Line of R code
        debug - Set true to log line to debug log
        Returns:
        R code with a newline escape char
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to find the debug Config

      • rLinesReadStatsTable

        public static String rLinesReadStatsTable(String tableName,
                                          String suffix)
                                   throws Exception
        This method is used to read in the reports output by CalculateStats
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the stats table to build
        suffix - file suffix
        Returns:
        rCode
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs

      • writeNewScript

        public static void writeNewScript(String path,
                                  String rCode)
                           throws Exception
        This method generates an R script with the given rCode saved to the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to new R Script
        rCode - R script code
        Throws:
        Exception - if I/O errors occur

      • rMethodRunProgram

        protected static String rMethodRunProgram()
        This method returns R code for the function runProgram(). Primary method, wraps the call to main() in a sink() call to catch error messages, if any.
        Returns:
        R code
